title: Pet Rescue Saga v1.1.3.1 (Unlimited Mod)
description:
Can you bust through matching blocks to save the Pets from the evil Snatchers? Loads of tricky and challenging levels of puzzle excitement await in this amazing adventure.

Our first exciting mobile release features 117 mind-boggling levels! We're working hard to bring you tons of great features & levels in our next release.

Please note Pet Rescue Saga is completely free to play but some in-game items such as extra moves or lives will require payment. You can turn-off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your deviceÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s settings.

The Pets are desperate to be rescued! Please help now!

----------------------------------------------

Pet Rescue Saga features:
- A fantastic world alive with animals and wonders 
- Quick to learn, with hours of fun challenges 
- Eye-catching and colorful gameplay 
- Puppies, bunnies, piglets and many more lovable pets! 
- Spectacular boosters and bonus rewards 
- Diamonds, bombs, animal cages, locks & keys and more challenges await 
- An exciting leaderboard for you and your friends 
- Seamless synchronization with the Facebook version

What's in this version:
-Three brand-new episodes: 45 additional fun and challenging levels!
-New Wooden Cage and Infected Block game play. Free trapped pets from Wooden Cages, and prevent Infected Blocks from spreading their pestilence!
-New pets to rescue from peril: congenial cats, playful pandas and felicitous ferrets!
**Please rate Pet Rescue Saga after each update. We need your feedback to continue to provide the best possible gaming experience!**
Together letÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s stop the dastardly Pet Snatchers!
